trans-unit.source: Represents the header of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that this control belongs to.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The contextual tab group that the tab for this header is in; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the tab is not in a contextual tab group.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.ContextualTabGroup*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it has focus.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it has focus.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.FocusedBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it has focus.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it has focus.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.FocusedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether this header is for a tab in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this header is for a tab in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.IsContextualTab*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the tab that this header belongs to is selected.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tab that this header belongs to is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.IsRibbonTabSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse is over it.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when the mouse is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when the mouse is over it.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
Contains data about the activation.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.

This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> that this header belongs to when this header gets keyboard focus.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event data.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
This method attempts to move the focus to the first element in the tab when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed on the tab header.
If successful, it marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
Contains data about the activation.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> of a mouse left button down event on this tab header.

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.
The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

This override calls the base <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A> method, and then ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> is completely rendered before the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight%2A> properties are calculated.
The drawing instructions for a specific element.
This context is provided to the layout system.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
